code: import{ShortFilmDuration}from"./constants";export function filterMovies(movies,searchQuery){var filteredMovies=movies.filter(function(movie){return movie.nameRU.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase());});return filteredMovies;}export function filterCheckedMovies(movies,searchQuery){var filteredMovies=movies.filter(function(movie){if(movie.nameRU.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase())&&movie.duration<=ShortFilmDuration){return true;}else{return false;}});return filteredMovies;}
